channel.title: Santa on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in Santa on Life At The Circus

item.title: Cherishing These Days
item.description: It’s hard to believe that my youngest will be school age next year. Seriously, how did that happen? Sometimes when we drop the big kids off at their tutorial on “school at the building days” he will pause outside the Kindergarten room and tell me, “That’s where I go next year Momma and then you will be all alone and so sad.” And my heart kinda breaks a little. Because he is right.
